words.definition: The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
Representing the most perfect or typical example of a quality or class.
words.example: He was the quintessential tough guyâ€”strong, silent, and self-contained.

words.definition: Lasting for a very short time.
words.example: Fashions are ephemeral: new ones regularly drive out the old.
She accepted the invitation with alacrity.
